title: Update Pink Dreams gallery description text

requirements.summary: Update the description text for the first visible gallery image (id: '1', title: 'Pink Dreams') in the centralized site config so the gallery card and modal display the new wording.
acceptanceCriteria: The first visible gallery card (Pink Dreams) shows the updated description text exactly: "If there was an award for the cutest photo ever taken, this would win by a mile *kuchupuchu*".
No other gallery card titles or descriptions are changed.
Opening the image modal for the same image also shows the updated description text.

file_operations.description: In the galleryImages entry with id '1' and title 'Pink Dreams', change description from "This is the coolest photo of us in my gallery... uff Aesthetic log :>" to "If there was an award for the cutest photo ever taken, this would win by a mile *kuchupuchu*", without altering any other gallery image fields.
